name: exo-pocket

scripts.build: npm run build:index && tsc && vite build
scripts.audio:info: node -e "console.log('Web Speech API is used for narration; no npm deps needed.')"
scripts.shaders:build: node -e "console.log('Using Three.js + R3F; no shader compilation step required.')"
scripts.3d:features: node -e "console.log('Advanced 3D features (particles, atmosphere, orbits, comparison) implemented with existing Three.js & R3F.')"

advanced3DNotes: Particle systems, atmospheric scattering, orbital mechanics, and comparison views are implemented using existing dependencies (three, @react-three/fiber, @react-three/drei, @react-spring/*). No additional npm packages are required.
